mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_APP_EVA (APP_NUM, EVA_NUM, RATER_ID, SCORE_SUM, SCORE_COMMENT) VALUES (#{appNum}, #{evaNum}, #{raterId}, #{scoreSum}, #{scoreComment})

INSERT INTO TBL_EVA_DETAIL (EVA_DETAIL_NUM, EVA_NUM, APP_NUM, RATER_ID, EVA_ITEM_NUM, EVA_DETAIL_SCORE) VALUES (SEQ_TBL_EVA_DETAIL.nextval, #{evaNum}, #{appNum}, #{raterId}, #{evaItemNum}, #{evaDetailScore})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, APP_NUM, EVA_NUM, RATER_ID, SCORE_SUM, SCORE_COMMENT, SCORE_REG_DATE FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_APP_EVA ORDER BY APP_NUM DESC) ) WHERE (RNUM >= #{pageStart} AND RNUM <= #{pageEnd}) ORDER BY APP_NUM DESC, SCORE_REG_DATE DESC
